name: Ages of Man
description:
You are the Scion of a great kingdom in the North.

Your father has recently fallen ill, gravely so

The greatest healers of the realm have come and passed your father's bedside

In your desperation, you seek the help of a witch

She tells you of an ancient temple where a rite can be performed to extend the life of any mortal

You gather the boldest knights of your kingdom and lead the charge into the temple

Upon performing the rite, all of your men are cast to ash

You can feel your life being drained from you

You must escape while some still remains...
